__e: No matter what the situation, I just think about what you would do and I do the opposite.
Mr Steel...allowed you to play God? And who are you to say who is guilty or innocent, regardless of the law?
I need you to understand that whatever decision I make I am only trying to do what's best.
NO MATTER HOW MUCH WE MAY CARE FOR HER.
And when your heart is completely broken forever, you get to do whatever you want, no matter how crazy it seems to the woman who was his wife for 24 hours.
No matter how bad someone hurt her, she could always see the good in them.
Because no matter what happens to me, you were always my best thing.
You know, I believe, uh... that no matter what's happened in the past, if you do the right thing now, it can make a big difference.
I know we haven't seen eye to eye lately. That doesn't mean I don't love you, no matter what you are.
And I can't lose everything that I've ever wanted because of... because of some guy, no matter who that guy is.
I mean, d-didn't you... You always said that the marriage was the most important thing, no matter what, so don't you think that you...
Well, I got to know a woman who would bet on the best in us, who bet on people, no matter what the world said about who they were, who they should be.
Whether it's possible or not, I mean, Wouldn't you want the chance to talk to your husband again if you could?
You still have that hole inside you and it hurts just the same no matter how prepared you are for it or not.
I am just trying to come up with a fix for our patient, regardless of the fact that you don't even want me here.
You can love your kids no matter what their test scores, but you should only be proud of them for trying their best.
"whatever the cost may be, "I'm sure my family's an inconvenience to that plan.
You kept your boys close to you, no matter what you were involved in.
Jack, if we're going to have any kind of relationship, I need you to be completely honest with me, regardless of the circumstance.
- See, what happened there was, I knew what you were trying to say despite the exact words you were using.
And I know you don't like that but I also know you love me no matter who I see in my private life.
